H0.text: A Gay Girl in Damascus is the title of a hoax blog by fictional feminist/freedom campaigner Amina Abdallah Alaf al Omari, who in June 2011 was said to be based and abducted in which country. Egypt

H1.text: A Gay Girl in Damascus is the title of a hoax blog by fictional feminist/freedom campaigner Amina Abdallah Alaf al Omari, who in June 2011 was said to be based and abducted in which country. Lebanon

H2.text: A Gay Girl in Damascus is the title of a hoax blog by fictional feminist/freedom campaigner Amina Abdallah Alaf al Omari, who in June 2011 was said to be based and abducted in which country. Jordan

H3.text: A Gay Girl in Damascus is the title of a hoax blog by fictional feminist/freedom campaigner Amina Abdallah Alaf al Omari, who in June 2011 was said to be based and abducted in which country. سوريا

A4.text: During the 2011 Syrian uprising, a posting on the blog, purportedly by 'Amina's' cousin, claimed that the girl had been abducted on June 6, 2011.

A5.text: The blog's tagline was 'An out Syrian lesbian's thoughts on life, the universe and so on ...'
